item.title: Convert Your Shazam Playlist to YouTube Playlist
item.dc:creator: Charles Kabui
item.description: Shazam is an incredible app for identifying music playing around you. Whether you’re at a cafe, watching a movie, or just hearing a catchy tune on the radio, Shazam helps you discover new music effortlessly. However, the app’s main limitation is that it doesn’t allow you to play full songs unless you have a linked music streaming subscription.

item.title: Kenya Population from year 1974 to year 2022
item.dc:creator: Charles Kabui
item.description: The data has been sourced from the World Bank API.<sup>1</sup>

item.title: Artificial General Intelligence
item.dc:creator: Charles Kabui
item.description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is currently replacing simple tasks and some major tasks. Suppose we are to assume that AI is to incrementally become better, it will change most aspects of how we live our lives. If it becomes even stronger, it will probably change the future of humanity.
